trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for the <c>Sheet</c>*n* classes in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级项目中的 <c>Sheet</c>n 类的基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> class is the base class for the `Sheet`*n* classes in document-level Excel projects created by using Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>类是适用于基`Sheet` * n *通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档级 Excel 项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Use the `Sheet`*n* classes to programmatically access the worksheets in your project.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Sheet` * n *类以编程方式访问你的项目中的工作表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> class is a *host item* that represents a worksheet in document-level projects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>类是*主机项*表示文档级项目中的工作表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md) and [Worksheet Host Item](/visualstudio/vsto/worksheet-host-item.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md)和[工作表主机项](/visualstudio/vsto/worksheet-host-item.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> class provides the same members as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> class in the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features:
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>类提供相同的成员<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>中 Excel 主互操作程序集，但它的类添加以下功能：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add managed controls to an Excel worksheet, or to remove controls, at run time.
trans-unit.target: 将托管的控件添加到 Excel 工作表，或删除控件，在运行时，请使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.InnerObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.InnerObject%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> object for a worksheet host item.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来获取基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>工作表主机项的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.GetAutomationObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.GetAutomationObject%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以公开你的项目向工作表中的 VBA 代码中的类。

trans-unit.source: Document-level events, such as <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ActivateEvent> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Change>, that are provided only at the application level in the Excel object model.
trans-unit.target: 文档级事件，如<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ActivateEvent>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Change>，仅在 Excel 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。

trans-unit.source: That is, in the Excel object model, these events are defined in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application?displayProperty=fullName> class rather than the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，在 Excel 对象模型中，这些事件中定义<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application?displayProperty=fullName>类而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: Creating Worksheet Host Items
trans-unit.target: 创建工作表宿主项

trans-unit.source: You cannot create <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> objects programmatically in Office projects.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>以编程方式在 Office 项目中的对象。

trans-unit.source: In document-level projects, the `Sheet`*n* classes (which derive from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>) are instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在文档级项目中， `Sheet` * n *类 (从其派生<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>) 自动实例化[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]当最终用户打开工作簿。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: In application-level projects, you can create worksheet host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建工作表主机项以编程方式使用`GetVstoObject`方法。

trans-unit.source: The worksheet host item you create is a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> object, rather than a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建工作表主机项是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>对象，而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the worksheet is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活工作表时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ActivateEvent> event that displays the name of the worksheet when it is activated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ActivateEvent>显示工作表的名称时，它将激活的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> object that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 Excel 应用程序的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Application%2A> property to rearrange the application windows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Application%2A>重新排列应用程序窗口的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.AutoFilter" /> that provides information about filtered lists on the worksheet if filtering is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了筛选功能，则获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.AutoFilter" />，它提供工作表上的筛选列表的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets <see langword="null" /> if filtering is off.
trans-unit.target: 如果关闭了筛选功能，则获取 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.AutoFilter" /> that provides information about filtered lists on the worksheet if filtering is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.AutoFilter" />，它提供工作表上的筛选列表的相关信息（如果启用了筛选功能）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically enable filtering, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFilter%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoFilter%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式启用筛选，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFilter%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoFilter%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a filtered list of fruits in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilter%2A> property to display the filter criteria for the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建水果中的筛选的列表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilter%2A>属性来显示列表的筛选条件。

trans-unit.source: The example then prompts the user to turn off the filter by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A> property, and finally uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A> property to display whether the worksheet has a filtered list.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例提示用户关闭筛选器，通过使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A>属性，并且最后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A>属性来显示工作表是否能筛选的列表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering is currently enabled on the worksheet (that is, whether the filter drop-down arrows are currently displayed).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前是否在工作表上启用了筛选功能（即，当前是否显示了筛选器下拉箭头）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if filtering is currently enabled on the worksheet; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前已在工作表上启用筛选功能，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `false` to disable filtering (that is, to remove the filter drop-down arrows), but you cannot set it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此属性设置为`false`禁用筛选 (即，若要删除的筛选器下拉箭头)，但不能将其设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: To enable filtering and create a filtered list, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFilter%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object, or use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoFilter%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> object.
trans-unit.target: 启用筛选并创建筛选的列表，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFilter%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象，或使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoFilter%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>对象。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates only whether filtering is enabled; it does not indicate whether any data is being filtered.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅指示是否启用筛选;它不指示是否要筛选的任何数据。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the worksheet is actively filtering data, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定表是否正在主动筛选数据，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a filtered list of fruits in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilter%2A> property to display the filter criteria for the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建水果中的筛选的列表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilter%2A>属性来显示列表的筛选条件。

trans-unit.source: The example then prompts the user to turn off the filter by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A> property, and finally uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A> property to display whether the worksheet has a filtered list.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例提示用户关闭筛选器，通过使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A>属性，并且最后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A>属性来显示工作表是否能筛选的列表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet" /> 对象扩展的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> 对象扩展的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> class extends <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet> objects by implementing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IWorksheetExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>类扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet>对象通过实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IWorksheetExtension>接口。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the worksheet is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在双击工作表之后，默认的双击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the user double-clicks the border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不会发生，当用户双击单元格的边框。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.BeforeDoubleClick> event that cancels the double-click action on the current worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.BeforeDoubleClick>取消当前的工作表上双击操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler informs the user that double-clicking is not allowed for the worksheet, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeDoubleClickEventHandler> event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序告知用户双击不允许进行的工作表，然后设置`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeDoubleClickEventHandler>事件处理程序`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消双击操作。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the worksheet is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在右击工作表之后，默认的右击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.BeforeRightClick> event that cancels the right-click action on the current worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.BeforeRightClick>取消当前的工作表上右键单击操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler informs the user that right-clicking is not allowed for the worksheet, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler> event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序通知的用户，右键单击不允许的工作表，然后设置`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.DocEvents_BeforeRightClickEventHandler>事件处理程序`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消右键单击操作。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.target: 在重新计算工作表之后发生。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示工作表上的所有单元格（不仅仅是当前正在使用的单元格）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents all the cells on the worksheet (not just the cells that are currently in use).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示工作表上的所有单元格（不仅仅是当前正在使用的单元格）。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Cells%2A>属性可以在每个单元格设置名称、 大小和加粗字体的工作表上。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when something changes in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> cells.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> 单元格中的某些内容发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when cells change during a recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 在重新计算期间更改单元格时，此事件不会发生。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The name or number of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 图表的名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: This argument can be an array, to specify more than one chart.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以是一个数组，以指定多个图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single embedded chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" />) or a collection of all the embedded charts (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" />) on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示工作表上的单个嵌入式图表（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" />）或所有嵌入式图表的集合（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" />）。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents either a single embedded chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" />) or a collection of all the embedded charts (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" />) on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示工作表上的单个嵌入式图表（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" />）或所有嵌入式图表的集合（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" />）。

trans-unit.source: This method is not equivalent to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.Charts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不是等效于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.Charts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method returns embedded charts; the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.Charts%2A> property returns chart sheets.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回嵌入的图表;<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.Charts%2A>属性返回图表工作表。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ChartObjects%2A> method to get the collection of embedded charts and a single embedded chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ChartObjects%2A>方法以获取嵌入的图表和单个嵌入式的图表的集合。

trans-unit.source: The example first uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ChartObjects%2A> method to get the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the current worksheet and create a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例首先使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ChartObjects%2A>方法以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects?displayProperty=fullName>当前工作表的集合并创建新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: After formatting the new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName> and giving the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName> a name, the example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ChartObjects%2A> method to get the new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName> (indexed by its name) and displays a print preview of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 格式化新后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>并提供相关<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>一个名称，然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ChartObjects%2A>方法以获取新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>（按其名称进行索引），并显示打印预览的图表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the range containing the first circular reference on the sheet, or gets <see langword="null" /> if there is no circular reference on the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示包含表上第一个循环引用的范围，或者，如果表上不存在循环引用，则获取 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the range containing the first circular reference on the sheet; <see langword="null" /> if there is no circular reference on the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示包含表上第一个循环引用的范围，或者，如果表上不存在循环引用，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The circular reference must be removed before calculation can proceed.
trans-unit.target: 必须删除循环引用，然后计算才能继续。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a circular reference by setting the formulas of cells A1 and B1 to resolve to the value of each other.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例通过设置单元格 A1 和 B1 解析为各自的值的公式创建一个循环引用。

trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.CircularReference%2A>属性报告该工作表是否含有循环引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When used without parameters, this property returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object that contains all the columns on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象，其中包含工作表上的所有列。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific columns on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取工作表上的特定列。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index of one or more columns to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的一个或多个列的索引。

trans-unit.source: To get a single column, pass one of the following objects to this parameter:
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的单个列，请将以下对象之一传递给此参数：

trans-unit.source: - An integer that specifies the index of the column you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 的一个整数，指定你想要获取的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The column indexes begin at 1.
trans-unit.target: 列索引从 1 开始。

trans-unit.source: - A string that consists of the letter of the column you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 的你想要获取的列的字母组成字符串。

trans-unit.source: To get multiple contiguous columns, pass a string with the format "`first column letter`:`last column letter`".
trans-unit.target: 若要获取多个连续列，请传递与格式字符串"`first column letter`:`last column letter`"。

trans-unit.source: For example, to get columns A through E, pass "A:E".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要获取列 A 到 E，传递"A:E"。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** The name of this parameter is misleading; this parameter specifies the indexes of the columns you want to get, not the rows.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**此参数的名称有误导性; 此参数指定你想要获取，不是行的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This property will throw a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if you try to pass a value to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" />，其中包含工作表上的所有托管控件。

trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时管理的工作表上的控件，请使用方法和属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection>返回对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The sheet before which the copied sheet will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 将在其之前放置复制表的表。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>Before</c> if you specify <c>After</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>After</c>，则不能指定 <c>Before</c>。

trans-unit.source: The sheet after which the copied sheet will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 将在其之后放置复制表的表。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>After</c> if you specify <c>Before</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>Before</c>，则不能指定 <c>After</c>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the worksheet to another location in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将工作表复制到工作簿中的另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: The new worksheet is a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> object and does not have the code or data binding capability that worksheet host items have.
trans-unit.target: 新工作表是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>对象，并且不具有工作表宿主项具有的代码或数据绑定功能。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify either `Before` or `After`, Microsoft Office Excel creates a new workbook that contains the copied sheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定`Before`或`After`，Microsoft Office Excel 创建新的工作簿包含复制的表。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed to be used in Microsoft Office Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于在 Microsoft Office Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符创建者代码。

trans-unit.source: For example, Excel has the creator code XCEL.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Excel 具有接的创建者代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether page breaks (both automatic and manual) on the worksheet are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示分页符（自动和手动）是否显示在工作表上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if page breaks (both automatic and manual) on the worksheet are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果分页符（自动和手动）显示在表上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property if you do not have a printer installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有安装打印机，不能设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the worksheet is displayed from right to left instead of from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否是从右向左，而不是从左向右显示工作表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the worksheet is displayed from right to left instead of from left to right; <see langword="false" /> if the object is displayed from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作表是从右向左，而不是从左向右显示，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果该对象是从左向右显示，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Dispose%2A> method yourself.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Dispose%2A>方法自己。

trans-unit.source: When the document in a document-level customization is closed, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the customization.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭的文档级自定义项中的文档时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]清理使用自定义项的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Dispose%2A> method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Dispose%2A>方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether AutoFilter arrows are enabled when user-interface-only protection is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当打开仅限用户界面保护时是否启用“自动筛选”箭头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if AutoFilter arrows are enabled when user-interface-only protection is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在打开仅限用户界面保护时启用“自动筛选”箭头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to each worksheet and is not saved with the worksheet or session.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于每个工作表，并且不与工作表或会话一起保存。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel automatically recalculates the worksheet when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否在必要时自动重新计算工作表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel automatically recalculates the worksheet when necessary; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 在必要时自动重新计算工作表，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `false`, you cannot request a recalculation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值时`false`，不能请求重新计算。

trans-unit.source: When you change the value from `false` to `true`, Excel recalculates the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 当你更改的值从`false`到`true`，Excel 会重新计算工作表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether conditional formats will occur automatically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定条件格式是否将自动发生。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if evaluation of conditional formats will occur automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件格式的计算将自动发生，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.EnableFormatConditionsCalculation%2A> property is set to `false`, existing conditional formats will not be re-evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.EnableFormatConditionsCalculation%2A>属性设置为`false`，不会重新评估现有的条件格式。

trans-unit.source: Any previously applied conditional formatting will still be visible, but will not be updated as cell values or AppliesTo ranges are changed.
trans-unit.target: 任何以前应用的条件格式设置将仍是可见的但不是会作为单元格的值更新或更改 AppliesTo 范围。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to configure a rule completely before evaluating it.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`以对其进行评估之前完全配置一个规则。

trans-unit.source: This can result in a performance increase if the range over which the condition is applied is large.
trans-unit.target: 如果对其应用条件的范围很大，这可能导致性能增加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether outlining symbols are enabled when user-interface-only protection is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当打开仅限用户界面保护时是否启用大纲显示符号。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if outlining symbols are enabled when user-interface-only protection is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在打开仅限用户界面保护时启用大纲显示符号，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to each worksheet and is not saved with the worksheet or session.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于每个工作表，并且不与工作表或会话一起保存。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether PivotTable controls and actions are enabled when user-interface-only protection is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当打开仅限用户界面保护时是否启用数据透视表控件及操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if PivotTable controls and actions are enabled when user-interface-only protection is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在打开仅限用户界面保护时启用数据透视表控件及操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to each worksheet and is not saved with the worksheet or session.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于每个工作表，并且不与工作表或会话一起保存。

trans-unit.source: There must be a sufficient number of unlocked cells below and to the right of the PivotTable report for Microsoft Office Excel to recalculate and display the PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 必须有足够数量的未锁定的单元格下方，并重新计算和显示数据透视表报告的 Microsoft Office excel 数据透视表的右侧。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which cells can be selected on the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在工作表上可以选择哪些单元格。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property takes effect only when the worksheet is protected: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection.xlNoSelection> prevents any selection on the sheet, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection.xlUnlockedCells> allows only those cells that are not locked to be selected, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection.xlNoRestrictions> allows any cell to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅在受保护工作表时，才起作用：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection.xlNoSelection>可防止在表中，任何所选内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection.xlUnlockedCells>允许未锁定要选择这些单元格和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlEnableSelection.xlNoRestrictions>允许要选择的任何单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A> method to protect the worksheet, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.EnableSelection%2A> property to prevent any cell on the worksheet from being selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A>方法来保护工作表，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.EnableSelection%2A>属性以防止工作表中的任意单元格选择。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object, using the naming convention of Excel.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称（使用 Excel 的命名约定）。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Microsoft Office Excel name to an object or a value.
trans-unit.target: 将 Microsoft Office Excel 名称转换为对象或值。

trans-unit.source: The following types of names in Excel can be used with this method:
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，可以使用以下类型的名称在 Excel 中：

trans-unit.source: Defined names.
trans-unit.target: 定义的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can specify any name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定任何名称。

trans-unit.source: External references.
trans-unit.target: 外部引用。

trans-unit.source: You can use the !
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ！

trans-unit.source: operator to refer to a worksheet defined in another workbook.
trans-unit.target: 若要引用在另一个工作簿中定义的工作表的运算符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Evaluate%2A> method to evaluate the value of cell A1 as an input into the Excel `SIN` function.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Evaluate%2A>方法的值进行比较的 A1 单元格作为输入到 Excel`SIN`函数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> values that specifies whether to save the workbook in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> 值，该值指定是否要将工作簿保存为 PDF 或 XPS 格式。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，Excel 会将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> values that specifies the quality of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> 值，该值指定导出文件的质量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the exported file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出的文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore any print areas set when exporting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在导出时忽略任何打印区域设置，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start exporting.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始导出的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, exporting starts at the first page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则从第一页开始导出。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to export.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, exporting ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则导出至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the file in the viewer immediately; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即在查看器中显示文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the workbook to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指向 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现的指针，可使工作簿保存为另一种固定格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Exports to a file of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 导出到指定格式的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method also supports initializing an add-in to export a file to a fixed-format file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还支持初始化外接程序将文件导出到固定格式文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, Excel will perform file format conversion if the converters are present.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果存在转换器，则 Excel 将执行文件的格式转换。

trans-unit.source: The conversion is usually initiated by the user.
trans-unit.target: 通常由用户启动转换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves the content of the worksheet `Sheet1` in PDF format, up to the first four pages (ignoring print areas).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将工作表的内容保存`Sheet1`以 PDF 格式，最多前四个页并 （忽略打印区域）。

trans-unit.source: The PDF file is saved to the specified file path and file name using the standard quality resolution.
trans-unit.target: PDF 文件保存到指定的文件路径和文件的名称，使用标准质量分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The file includes the workbook properties.
trans-unit.target: 该文件包含工作簿属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must include a sheet named Sheet1 with some data.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含一些数据的名为 Sheet1 的表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the worksheet is actively filtering data.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作表是否正在主动筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the worksheet is actively filtering data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作表正在主动筛选数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether filtering is currently enabled (that is, whether the filter drop-down arrows are displayed on the worksheet), use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否可以使用筛选当前已启用 （即，是否在工作表中显示的筛选器下拉箭头），请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To enable filtering and create a filtered list, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFilter%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object, or use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoFilter%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange> object.
trans-unit.target: 启用筛选并创建筛选的列表，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.AutoFilter%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象，或使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.AutoFilter%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange>对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is `true` if the worksheet contains a filtered list in which there are hidden rows.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是`true`如果工作表包含其中有隐藏的行的筛选的列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a filtered list of fruits in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilter%2A> property to display the filter criteria for the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建水果中的筛选的列表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilter%2A>属性来显示列表的筛选条件。

trans-unit.source: The example then prompts the user to turn off the filter by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A> property, and finally uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A> property to display whether the worksheet has a filtered list.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例提示用户关闭筛选器，通过使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.AutoFilterMode%2A>属性，并且最后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.FilterMode%2A>属性来显示工作表是否能筛选的列表。

trans-unit.source: The sheet before which the moved sheet will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 移动工作表的放置位置之后的工作表。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>Before</c> if you specify <c>After</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>After</c>，则不能指定 <c>Before</c>。

trans-unit.source: The sheet after which the moved sheet will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 移动工作表的放置位置之前的工作表。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>After</c> if you specify <c>Before</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>Before</c>，则不能指定 <c>After</c>。

trans-unit.source: Moves the worksheet to another location in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将工作表移动到工作簿中的另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify either `Before` or `After`, Microsoft Office Excel creates a new workbook that contains the moved sheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定`Before`或`After`，Microsoft Office Excel 创建新的工作簿包含移动的工作表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that specifies where the Clipboard contents should be pasted.

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current selection is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前选择。

trans-unit.source: This argument can be specified only if the contents of the Clipboard can be pasted into a range.
trans-unit.target: 仅当可将剪贴板的内容粘贴到范围中时，才能指定此参数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is specified, the <c>Link</c> argument cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了此参数，则无法使用 <c>Link</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to establish a link to the source of the pasted data.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可建立指向粘贴数据的源的链接。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is specified, the <c>Destination</c> argument cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了此参数，则无法使用 <c>Destination</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard onto the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 将剪贴板的内容粘贴到工作表上。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the `Destination` argument, you must select the destination range before you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定`Destination`自变量，你必须选择目标范围之前使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method might modify the sheet selection, depending on the contents of the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以修改表的选定区域，具体取决于剪贴板的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example places the text "Paste Example" onto the Clipboard, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Paste%2A> method to paste the contents of the Clipboard into cell A1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本到剪贴板上的"粘贴示例"，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Paste%2A>方法以将剪贴板内容粘贴到 A1 单元格。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the Clipboard format of the data.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定数据的剪贴板格式。

trans-unit.source: Common format strings include "HTML", "Bitmap", "Hyperlink", "Unicode Text", and "Text".
trans-unit.target: 常见格式字符串包括“HTML”、“位图”、“超链接”、“Unicode 文本”和“文本”。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to establish a link to the source of the pasted data.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可建立指向粘贴数据的源的链接。

trans-unit.source: If the source data is not suitable for linking or the source application does not support linking, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果源数据不适合链接或源应用程序不支持链接，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the pasted object as an icon.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可以图标形式显示粘贴的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains the icon to use if <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则为包含要使用的图标的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the icon within the icon file.
trans-unit.target: 图标文件中该图标的索引号。

trans-unit.source: The text label of the icon.
trans-unit.target: 图标的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to remove all formatting, hyperlinks, and images from HTML; <see langword="false" /> to paste HTML as is.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可从 HTML 移除所有格式设置、超链接和图像；为 <see langword="false" /> 可按原样粘贴 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard onto the worksheet, using a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式将剪贴板的内容粘贴到工作表上。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to paste data from other applications or to paste data in a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可粘贴来自其他应用程序的数据或以特定格式粘贴数据。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know which string to pass to the Format parameter, you can view the strings that are compatible with the data on the Clipboard by trying the paste command in Excel .
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道要传递给该格式参数的字符串，则可以查看尝试在 Excel 中的粘贴命令与在剪贴板上的数据兼容的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Copy the data to the Clipboard, use the **Paste Special** command in Excel, and then view the formats listed in the **Paste Special** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 将数据复制到剪贴板，使用**选择性粘贴**在 Excel 中，命令，然后查看中列出的格式**选择性粘贴**对话框。

trans-unit.source: `NoHTMLFormatting` will only matter when `Format` = "HTML".
trans-unit.target: `NoHTMLFormatting` 将仅一回事时`Format`="HTML"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, `NoHTMLFormatting` will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，`NoHTMLFormatting`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: You must select the destination range before you use this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法之前，您必须选择目标范围。

trans-unit.source: This method might modify the sheet selection, depending on the contents of the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以修改表的选定区域，具体取决于剪贴板的内容。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).
trans-unit.target: 在对数据透视表内的单元格或单元格范围进行编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableAfterValueChange> event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableAfterValueChange>事件不会在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下发生。

trans-unit.source: For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它时不会出现数据透视表是刷新、 排序、 筛选，或向下钻取，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源中检索新值。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableBeforeAllocateChanges> event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableBeforeAllocateChanges> Excel 立即执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句以将所有更改都应用到数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前, 和用户已选择的用户界面以都应用更改后立即时发生事件。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交数据透视表的更改之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableBeforeCommitChanges> event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableBeforeCommitChanges> Excel 立即执行针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，提交事务之前，用户已选择为整个数据透视表中保存更改后立即发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes.
trans-unit.target: Excel 执行针对 OLAP 数据源，ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句，如果在事务仍处于活动状态，且然后用户已选择放弃所做的更改之后将丢弃所有数据透视表中, 编辑过的值之前立即发生。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 在对数据透视表进行更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableChangeSync> occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableChangeSync>过程中发生的大多数更改在数据透视表，以便你可以编写代码以响应用户操作，例如清除、 分组或刷新数据透视表中的项。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: The name or number of the report.
trans-unit.target: 报表的名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single PivotTable report (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> object) or a collection of all the PivotTable reports (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTables" /> object) on a worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示工作表上的单个数据透视表（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> 对象）或所有数据透视表的集合（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTables" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents either a single PivotTable report (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> object) or a collection of all the PivotTable reports (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTables" /> object) on a worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示工作表上的单个数据透视表（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> 对象）或所有数据透视表的集合（一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTables" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTables%2A>方法以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTables?displayProperty=fullName>当前工作表的集合，并刷新集合中的每个数据透视表

trans-unit.target: 在工作表上更新数据透视表之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableUpdate> event that displays a message when a PivotTable report has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableUpdate>已更新数据透视表时显示一条消息的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotTableSourceType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotTableSourceType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The source of the report data.
trans-unit.target: 报表数据的源。

trans-unit.source: The data for the new report.
trans-unit.target: 新报表的数据。

trans-unit.source: Can be a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object, an array of ranges, or a text constant that represents the name of another report.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象、范围数组或表示其他报表的名称的文本常数。

trans-unit.source: For an external database, <c>SourceData</c> is an array of strings containing the SQL query string, where each element is up to 255 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 对于外部数据库，<c>SourceData</c> 是包含 SQL 查询字符串的字符串数组，其中每个元素的最大长度为 255 个字符。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <c>Connection</c> argument to specify the ODBC connection string.
trans-unit.target: 应使用 <c>Connection</c> 参数指定 ODBC 连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: For compatibility with earlier versions of Excel, <c>SourceData</c> can be a two-element array.
trans-unit.target: 为了与较早版本的 Excel 兼容，<c>SourceData</c> 可以是二元素数组。

trans-unit.source: The first element is the connection string specifying the ODBC source for the data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素是指定数据的 ODBC 源的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The second element is the SQL query string used to get the data.
trans-unit.target: 第二个元素是用于获取数据的 SQL 查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <c>SourceData</c>, you must also specify <c>SourceType</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>SourceData</c>，还必须指定 <c>SourceType</c>。

trans-unit.source: If the active cell is inside the <c>SourceData</c> range, you must specify <c>TableDestination</c> as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果活动单元格在 <c>SourceData</c> 范围内，则还必须指定 <c>TableDestination</c>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object specifying where the report should be placed on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，指定应在工作表上放置报表的位置。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the report is placed at the active cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则报表将放置在活动单元格上。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new report.
trans-unit.target: 新报表的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show grand totals for rows in the report.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可显示报表中的总行数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show grand totals for columns in the report.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可显示报表中的总列数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save data with the report; <see langword="false" /> to save only the report definition.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则保存报表数据；为 <see langword="false" />，则仅保存报表定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel automatically format the report when it is refreshed or when fields are moved.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则 Microsoft Office Excel 可在刷新报表或移动字段后自动设置报表格式。

trans-unit.source: Valid only if <c>SourceType</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotTableSourceType.xlConsolidation" />.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <c>SourceType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotTableSourceType.xlConsolidation" /> 时才有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel create a page field for the consolidation.
trans-unit.target: 如果让 Excel 创建一个用于合并的页字段，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>AutoPage</c> is <see langword="false" />, you must create the page field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>AutoPage</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则必须创建一个或多个页字段。

trans-unit.source: Not used by Excel.
trans-unit.target: Excel 不使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel perform queries for the report asynchronously (in the background).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则 Excel 可异步执行（在后台）报表查询。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to optimize the PivotTable cache when it is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则可在构造数据透视表时对其缓存进行优化。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The order in which page fields are added to the PivotTable report’s layout.
trans-unit.target: 向数据透视表的布局添加页字段的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder.xlDownThenOver" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder.xlOverThenDown" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder.xlDownThenOver" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder.xlOverThenDown" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder.xlDownThenOver" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlOrder.xlDownThenOver" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of page fields in each column or row in the PivotTable report.
trans-unit.target: 数据透视表中每列或每行中的页字段数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a PivotTable cache that contains all records from the external database; this cache can be very large.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则可创建包含外部数据库所有记录的数据透视表缓存；此缓存可能很大。

trans-unit.source: If <c>ReadData</c> is <see langword="false" />, you can set some of the fields as server-based page fields before the data is actually read.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>ReadData</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则可以在实际读取数据前，将某些字段设置为基于服务器的页字段。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains ODBC settings that allow Excel to connect to an ODBC data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含使 Excel 连接到 ODBC 数据源的 ODBC 设置。

trans-unit.source: The connection string has the form "ODBC;<connection string>".
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串具有格式“ODBC;<连接字符串>”。

trans-unit.source: This argument overrides any previous setting for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCache" /> object’s <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCache.Connection" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 此参数重写 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCache" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCache.Connection" /> 属性的所有以前的设置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method does not display the PivotTable Wizard.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不显示数据透视表向导。

trans-unit.source: This method is not available for OLE DB data sources.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不是可用于 OLE DB 数据源。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheets.Add%2A> method to add a PivotTable cache, and then create a PivotTable report based on the cache.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheets.Add%2A>方法可添加数据透视表缓存中，然后创建一个数据透视表报告基于该高速缓存。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PivotTableWizard%2A>方法来创建数据透视表基于范围的 A1 至 C4 当前工作表的单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> that represents the previous sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示上一个表的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> that represents the previous sheet; <see langword="null" /> if the current worksheet is the first sheet in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 表示上一个表的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" />；如果当前工作表是工作簿中的第一个表，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Previous%2A>属性来确定是否当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>是工作簿中的第一个表。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> is not the first sheet, then the name of the previous sheet is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>不是第一个表，则显示上一个工作表的名称。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of comment pages that will be printed for the current worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取要为当前工作表打印的注释页的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of comment pages that will be printed for the current worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 要为当前工作表打印的注释页的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PrintedCommentPages%2A> property will only return a number greater than zero if the **Comments** setting on the **Sheet** tab of the **Page Setup** dialog box is set to **At end of sheet**.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.PrintedCommentPages%2A>属性仅将返回一个数字大于零如果**注释**上设置**表**选项卡**页面设置**对话框中设置为**在表的末尾**。

trans-unit.source: This property will return zero if the sheet is a Chart sheet or a MS Excel 5.0 Dialog sheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果表是图表工作表或 MS Excel 5.0 对话框工作表，此属性将返回零。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start printing.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始打印的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则打印从第一页开始。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此参数，则打印一份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在打印对象前让 Microsoft Office Excel 调用打印预览，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to print the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 若要立即打印对象，请使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the active printer.
trans-unit.target: 设置活动打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print to a file.
trans-unit.target: 若要打印到文件，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrToFileName</c> is not specified, Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 <c>PrToFileName</c>，则 Excel 会提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to collate multiple copies.
trans-unit.target: 若逐份打印多个副本，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrintToFile</c> is set to <see langword="true" />, this argument specifies the name of the file you want to print to.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>PrintToFile</c> 设为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数指定要打印到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore print areas and print the entire workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要忽略打印区域并打印整个工作簿，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Prints the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 打印工作表。

trans-unit.source: "Pages" in the descriptions of `From` and `To` refers to printed pages, not to overall pages in the sheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: "页"中的说明`From`和`To`指打印的页面，不适用于表或工作簿中的全部页。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive password for the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 工作表的密码，区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, you can unprotect the worksheet without using a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则无需使用密码即可取消对工作表的保护。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must specify the password to unprotect the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 否则，您必须指定密码才能取消对工作表的保护。

trans-unit.source: If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果忘记密码，则无法取消对工作表的保护。

trans-unit.source: It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place.
trans-unit.target: 最好将密码及其对应文档名的列表保存在安全的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect shapes.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时保护形状。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect contents in the locked cells.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可保护锁定单元格中的内容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时保护方案。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect the user interface, but not macros.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可保护用户界面，但不保护宏。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, protection applies both to macros and to the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则同时对宏和用户界面应用保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to format any cell on a protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户格式化受保护的工作表上的任何单元格。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to format any column on a protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户格式化受保护的工作表上的任何列。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to format any row on a protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户格式化受保护的工作表上的任何行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to insert columns on the protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上插入列。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to insert rows on the protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上插入行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to insert hyperlinks on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在工作表上插入超链接。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to delete columns on the protected worksheet, where every cell in the column to be deleted is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上删除列，此处要删除的列中的每个单元格都已被解除锁定。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to delete rows on the protected worksheet, where every cell in the row to be deleted is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上删除行，此处要删除的行中的每个单元格都已被解除锁定。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to sort on the protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Every cell in the sort range must be unlocked or unprotected.
trans-unit.target: 排序范围中的每个单元格都必须已解除锁定或不受保护。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to set filters on the protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上设置筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Users can change filter criteria but can not enable or disable an autofilter.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以更改筛选条件，但不能启用或禁用自动筛选。

trans-unit.source: Users can set filters on an existing autofilter.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在现有的自动筛选上设置筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to use pivot table reports on the protected worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在受保护的工作表上使用数据透视表。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Protects a worksheet so that it cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 保护工作表使其无法修改。

trans-unit.source: If you apply this method with the `UserInterfaceOnly` argument set to `true` and then save the workbook, the entire worksheet (not just the interface) will be fully protected when you reopen the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果将应用此方法与`UserInterfaceOnly`参数设置为`true`以及然后保存该工作簿，整张工作表 （而不仅仅是接口） 将完全保护时重新打开工作簿。

trans-unit.source: To re-enable the user interface protection after the workbook is opened, you must again apply this method with `UserInterfaceOnly` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开工作簿后，重新启用用户界面保护，必须再次应用使用此方法`UserInterfaceOnly`设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to make changes to a protected worksheet if the password is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 可对受保护工作表进行更改，如果提供密码。

trans-unit.source: Also, another method would be to unprotect the worksheet, make the necessary changes, and then protect the worksheet again.
trans-unit.target: 此外，另一种方法将取消保护工作表，进行必要的更改，然后然后再次保护工作表。

trans-unit.source: 'Unprotected' means the cell may be locked (**Format Cells** dialog) but is included in a range defined in the **Allow Users to Edit Ranges** dialog, and the user has unprotected the range with a password or been validated via NT permissions.
trans-unit.target: 未受保护，则表示可能会锁定该单元格 (**设置单元格格式**对话框)，但包括在中定义的范围**允许用户编辑范围**对话框中，并且用户已取消保护具有密码的范围或已验证通过 NT 权限。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ProtectContents%2A> property to determine whether the contents of the worksheet are protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ProtectContents%2A>属性以确定是否受保护工作表内容。

trans-unit.source: If the contents are unprotected, then the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A> method is called with the `Contents` parameter set to `true` so that the contents are protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未受保护，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A>方法调用与`Contents`参数设置为`true`以便保护内容。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作表的内容（单个单元格）是否受保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contents of the sheet are protected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表的内容受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果形状受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ProtectDrawingObjects%2A>属性以确定是否受保护工作表上的形状。

trans-unit.source: If shapes are unprotected, then the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A> method is called with the `DrawingObjects` parameter set to `true` so that shapes are protected.

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Protection" /> 对象，表示工作表的保护选项。

trans-unit.target: 若要打开用户界面保护，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A>方法替换`UserInterfaceOnly`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户界面未受保护，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Protect%2A>方法调用与`UserInterfaceOnly`参数设置为`true`这样的用户界面会受到保护。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作表方案是否受保护。

trans-unit.target: 如果工作表方案受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.ProtectScenarios%2A>属性以确定是否受保护工作表方案。
