trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents a cell or a range of cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示一个单元格或一定单元格范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that represents a cell or a range of cells.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示一个单元格或单元格范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The name of the range in A1-style notation in the language of the application.
trans-unit.target: 采用应用程序语言的以 A1 样式表示法表示的范围名称。

trans-unit.source: It can include the range operator (a colon), the intersection operator (a space), or the union operator (a comma).
trans-unit.target: 范围名称可以包括范围运算符（冒号）、交集运算符（空格）或并集运算符（逗号）。

trans-unit.source: It can also include dollar signs, but they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 范围名称还可以包括货币符号，但是这些符号被忽略。

trans-unit.source: You can use a local defined name in any part of the range.
trans-unit.target: 可以在范围的任何部分中使用本地定义的名称。

trans-unit.source: If you use a name, the name is assumed to be in the language of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用一个名称，则假定该名称使用的是应用程序的语言。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The cell in the lower-right corner of the range.
trans-unit.target: 范围右下角的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Can be a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName> that contains a single cell, an entire column, an entire row, or it can be a string that names a single cell in the language of the application.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个包含单个单元格、整列、整行的 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>，或者可以是一个以应用程序的语言命名单个单元格的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is optional in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 此参数在 Visual Basic 中是可选的。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet._RangeType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet._RangeType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates different ways to use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A> property to access a single cell or multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用不同方式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Range%2A>属性来访问单个或多个单元格。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Resets all page breaks on the specified worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 重置指定工作表上的所有分页符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents one or more rows on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示工作表上一个或多个行的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents one or more rows on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示工作表上一个或多个行的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When used without parameters, this property returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object that contains all the rows on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>对象，其中包含工作表上的所有行。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific rows on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取工作表上的特定行。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index of one or more rows to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的一个或多个行的索引。

trans-unit.source: To get a single row, pass an integer that specifies the index of the row you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取单个行，请传递一个整数，指定你想要获取的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The row indexes begin at 1.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 开始的行索引。

trans-unit.source: To get multiple contiguous rows, pass a string with the format "`first row`:`last row`".
trans-unit.target: 若要获取多个连续行，请传递与格式字符串"`first row`:`last row`"。

trans-unit.source: For example, to get rows 1 through 5, pass "1:5".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要获取行 1 至 5，可传递"1:5"。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This property will throw a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if you try to pass a value to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Rows%2A> property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first five rows on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Rows%2A>属性设置颜色、 名称、 大小和加粗的字体的所有单元格的前五个行中，工作表上。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path; if you do not, Microsoft Office Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可以包含完整路径；否则，Microsoft Office Excel 将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: The file format to use when you save the file.
trans-unit.target: 保存文件时要使用的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid choices, see the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.FileFormat" /> property.

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive string (no more than 15 characters) that indicates the protection password to be given to the file.

trans-unit.source: If a file is saved with the password and the password is not supplied when the file is opened, the file is opened as read-only.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the worksheet host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在工作表宿主项关闭时发生。

trans-unit.source: This is the last event to be called in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> class as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase> class unloads.
trans-unit.target: 这是要在中调用的最后一个事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>类作为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase>类卸载。

trans-unit.source: Use this event for any additional clean up.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。

trans-unit.source: In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the worksheet host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项，工作表主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the worksheet host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，工作表主机项关闭时，不会不卸载应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Also, the underlying worksheet object is no more available.
trans-unit.target: 此外，基础的工作表对象将不再可用。

trans-unit.source: To access the worksheet before it shuts down use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.BeforeClose> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问该工作表关闭使用之前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.BeforeClose>相反。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code calls the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sort.Apply` method to sort the specified worksheet data.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive password to use to unprotect the worksheet.

trans-unit.source: If the worksheet is not protected with a password, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作表未使用密码保护，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this argument for a worksheet that is protected with a password, you will be prompted for the password.

trans-unit.source: If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果忘记密码，则无法取消对工作表的保护。

trans-unit.source: It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place.

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines whether the cell contents of the current worksheet are protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例确定是否当前的工作表的单元格内容受保护。

trans-unit.source: If the cell contents are protected, then the example prompts the user to unprotect the cell contents by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果受保护的单元格内容，则该示例将提示用户取消单元格内容保护使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Unprotect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents all the cells that have contained a value at any time.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示在任何时候都包含值的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents all the cells that have contained a value at any time.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示在任何时候都包含值的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: A used range includes any cell that has ever been used.
trans-unit.target: 使用的范围还包括曾经使用任何单元格。

trans-unit.source: For example, if cell **A1** contains a value, and then you delete the value, then cell **A1** is considered used.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果单元格**A1**包含一个值，然后删除值，则单元格**A1**被视为使用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.UsedRange%2A> property will return a range that includes cell **A1**.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.UsedRange%2A>属性将返回一系列，包括单元格**A1**。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.UsedRange%2A> property to select the range of used cells on a worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.UsedRange%2A>属性选择的范围使用工作表上的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The example first sets the range of cells from A1 to C3 on the current worksheet to the value 23.
trans-unit.target: 本示例首先设置单元格的范围从 A1 为 C3 在为 23 的值的当前工作表。

trans-unit.source: If the worksheet is visible, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.UsedRange%2A> property to select the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName> of used cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作表是可见的则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.UsedRange%2A>属性以选择<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range?displayProperty=fullName>使用的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The XPath to query for.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的 XPath。

trans-unit.source: A space-delimited string that contains the namespaces referenced in the XPath parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个以空格分隔的字符串，其中包含在 XPath 参数中引用的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A run-time error is generated if one of the specified namespaces cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法解析指定的命名空间之一，则产生运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap" />。

trans-unit.source: Specify an XML map if you want to query for the XPath within a specific map.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在特定映射中查询 XPath，请指定 XML 映射。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the cells mapped to a particular XPath.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示映射到特定 XPath 的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets <see langword="null" /> if the specified XPath has not been mapped to the worksheet, or if the mapped range is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 XPath 未映射到工作表，或者如果映射的范围为空，则获取 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> object that represents the cells mapped to a particular XPath; <see langword="null" /> if the specified XPath has not been mapped to the worksheet, or if the mapped range is empty.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 对象，表示映射到特定 XPath 的单元格；如果指定的 XPath 未映射到工作表，或者如果映射的范围为空，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.
trans-unit.target: XML 功能，除了将文件保存 XML 电子表格格式，将仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中可用。

trans-unit.source: If the XPath exists within a column in an XML list, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object returned does not include the header row or the Insert row.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XPath 中的 XML 列表中中的列存在则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>返回的对象是否不包含标头行或插入行。
